name: Mini Ice Cream Pretzel Sandwiches
author: lutzflcat
summary: These little one- or two-bite ice cream sandwiches are quick and easy to make, and fun to eat. Different flavors of ice cream and fresh fruit give you lots of options.
ingredients: ½ cup strawberry ice cream, or as needed
directions: Spoon about 2 teaspoons ice cream onto 12 Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®, and smooth out over the pretzel
Top with a strawberry slice and a square of chocolate candy bar
Add a small dollop of ice cream on top to hold the sandwich together
Arrange on a serving plate and place in the freezer for about 15 minutes or until the ice cream is re-frozen before serving
